summary: Mod that adds Grasses (Glasses with Grass on them) to the game. For obvious reasons.
descriptionHtml:
Mod that adds Grasses (Glasses with Grass on them) to the game. For obvious reasons. 

This mod is based off of an existing mod called Rayban-like Sunglass by bendendo. Check out his mod here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33787/?

You can get the Grasses by opening console and typing "help sunglasses". They will simply be titled Sunglasses, add one to your inventory and Gattsu on struggler.
author: Vegito73
